Posts.Content: ashleyaz wrote: Hi friends I am not sure of the best order of events--what would you do if this were your situation? timeline- Dec1--first baseline mammogram--i am 37, mom had breast cancer when she was 57  Dec 14--magnified mammo--still showed calcifications on left breast--different sizes and shapes in a sort-of line... radiologist recommended a mri of that breast.  Results to come early next week (jan4th-ish) Dec 28--met with a recommended beast surgeon(dr donahue in phoenix).  He recommends a stereotactic biopsy.   So. Now what? do i get the biopsy with dr donahue (highly recommended, has done over 1000 of these)? do i meet with another surgeon first (dr Zannis--also highly recommended) on jan 11 and get his opinion and then make a decision about surgeons first before i even get the biopsy?  i plan on a biopsy no matter what   Do i wait until jan 21st when i can get a consult with a doc at the mayo clinic in scottsdale?  Then get a biopsy thru them and then see the results--prob at the end of the month...? what would you suggest? My goals- get a biopsy get results do it all as soon as possible:) thanks  Log in to post a reply
